definition: variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: The way one studies for tests is very important.
Sing a song, Revision the target language in lesson 8 .
sentences.chinese: 目的是复习第8课的目标语言，引出新课。

sentences.english: After class, I always review lessons and sing some chants.
sentences.chinese: 死啊课后，我总会复习课文然后唱一些颂歌。

sentences.english: From my experience, I'd like to talk about the importance and steps of review.
sentences.chinese: 我愿意从我的经验谈复习的重要性和步骤方法。

sentences.english: Third, after-school careful review, the consolidation of the knowledge the teacher said on the day.
sentences.chinese: 第三，课后认真复习，巩固当天老师讲过地知识。

sentences.english: Methods 3 cases of mesonephric adenocarcinoma of the bladder were reviewed with review of the literature.
sentences.chinese: 方法总结3例病人资料，结合文献复习讨论。

sentences.english: Regular review ca strong make our new knowledge perma strongnent.
sentences.chinese: 按期复习能帮手波动新知识。

sentences.english: Have you ever crammed for tests?
sentences.chinese: 你有过为考试紧急复习的时候吗？

sentences.english: After supper, Cliff spread out his books before him to start reviewing his lessons.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭后克里夫把书本摊在面前开始复习功课。

sentences.english: You only review your lessons in one month?
sentences.chinese: 你们只用一个月的时间来复习？

sentences.english: This section contains the review and actual quiz materials for the course.
sentences.chinese: 此部分包括课程复习资料和测验的全真试题。

sentences.english: Tis alby oneself vain to learn wisdom or yet live foolishly.
sentences.chinese: 枉自己好好复习智慧，却做愚蠢事。

sentences.english: All department heads to review the Brand Standards Audit form for their respective area.
sentences.chinese: 所有部门的领导为各自的区域复习品牌标准审核表。

sentences.english: Anything that is new to you must be written down in order to review it after class and learn it well.
sentences.chinese: 所有新知识必须写下来并做好笔记以便课后进行复习。

sentences.english: A youth man practised talking English dawn Mr. Green.
sentences.chinese: 一位年经人与格林男士复习讲英语。

definition: to sit an entrance exam for a graduate program

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
lit. to gnaw a book/to study/to cram
lit. to clasp the Buddha's feet when danger arises (idiom); fig. to profess devotion only when in trouble/doing things at the last minute/making a hasty last-minute effort
